thread.title: St. Louis fire captain among two shot while sitting in car in Soulard
thread.title_full: St. Louis fire captain among two shot while sitting in car in Soulard

author: From staff reports
title: St. Louis fire captain among two shot while sitting in car in Soulard
text:
Law and order Close 
A St. Louis Fire Department captain and a woman were sitting in this car when a gunman opened fire early on Monday, Feb. 6, 2017. Photo courtesy KTVI featured St. Louis fire captain among two shot while sitting in car in Soulard From staff reports 8 hrs ago ( … ) 
A St. Louis Fire Department captain and a woman were sitting in this car when a gunman opened fire early on Monday, Feb. 6, 2017. Photo courtesy KTVI 
ST. LOUIS • A man and woman were shot several times while sitting in a car early Monday in Soulard. 
St. Louis police say the woman, 26, was critically injured. The man, 30, was seriously hurt. He is a captain in the St. Louis Fire Department, authorities said. 
The two were inside a vehicle parked near Seventh and Sidney streets about 12:35 a.m. when a gunman approached and opened fire without warning, police said. The scene is near Humboldt Elementary. 
The woman was struck in the back. The man was injured in the hand, shoulder, knee and back. 
Police say both victims were stable at a hospital. 
Police did not have a detailed description of the gunman.
